title: Member Personas
description: Four types of builders show up every month. Each one gets tailored sessions, discussions, and take-home resources so their Bitcoin work moves faster.

members.title: Product Managers
members.tagline: Turn Lightning research into shippable specs.
members.summary: Builder meetups bundle real Lightning Network operations with macro research so you can validate a roadmap in a single evening. Watch channel operators configure nodes during the Lightning Network Workshop, absorb the "Introduction to Lightning Network" presentation details, and then pressure-test feature bets against news topics like Lightning Network growth and Taproot Assets adoption.

focusAreas.title: See Lightning friction live
focusAreas.description: Follow the Lightning Network Workshop schedule to observe how operators juggle liquidity, routing, and Docker setups before you write a single requirement.

focusAreas.title: Use news topics to size demand
focusAreas.description: Discussions on Lightning Network Capacity Growth and Taproot Assets show where merchants and wallets are feeling the most pressure.

meetupWins.title: Spec features with maintainers
meetupWins.description: Borrow the Lightning Tip Bot backlog to understand which customer problems already have reproducible steps and rough acceptance criteria.

meetupWins.title: Prioritize with real data
meetupWins.description: News topic breakdowns (e.g., Lightning Network Growth 2024) provide metrics you can paste straight into an OKR, milestone, or PRD.

meetupWins.title: Align launch playbooks
meetupWins.description: Entrepreneurs in the room share go-to-market realities for Bitcoin-first products in Vancouver so your release checklist covers regulation, custody, and education.

members.title: Developers
members.tagline: Pair-program Lightning, Taproot, and Nostr primitives.
members.summary: The Lightning Network Workshop gives you hands-on channel operations, while presentations like “Taproot and Schnorr Signatures” unpack protocol details you can immediately deploy. Combine that with project time on the Lightning Tip Bot and you leave every meetup having shipped something—or at least opened a compelling PR.

members.tagline: Prototype Bitcoin flows that regular humans understand.

We unpack debates like Ordinals vs. block space so you can explain trade-offs to stakeholders visually.
